com.namics.oss.spring.support.i18n.service

Interface MessageManagementService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageManagementServiceImpl

    @Transactional(readOnly=true,
               rollbackFor=I18nException.class)
public interface MessageManagementService
    A management service providing methods to maintain message resources in the system. You will find it quite hand in combination with jdbc based message infrastructure.
    Since:
    Namics commons i18n 1.0 - Oct 19, 2010
    Author:
    aschaefer, namics ag

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteMessage(String codeId)
      deletes a single message by code from the backend.
      void deleteMessageForLanguage(String codeId, Locale locale)
      deletes a single message by code and language from the backend.
      void exportToExcel2007(OutputStream output)
      This method will write all messages in the datasource in MS Excel 2007 format to the provided OutputStream.
      void exportToExcel97(OutputStream output)
      This method will write all messages in the datasource in MS Excel 97 format to the provided OutputStream.
      void exportToText(OutputStream output)
      Method writes a text representation for all messages in the system to the output stream.
      List<MessageResourceEntry> getAllMessages()
      Method to resolve all messages available in the maintained data source.
      Map<String,List<MessageResourceEntry>> getAllMessagesGrouped()
      Method to resolve all messages available in the maintained data source.

      Returns a list of currently available languages.

      Gets a single message by code and locale from the backend.

      • getMessage

        String getMessage(String codeId,
                  Locale locale)
           throws I18nException
        Gets a single message by code and locale from the backend.
        Parameters:
        codeId - the code to resolve a message for
        locale - the language in which the message should be resolved-s
        Returns:
        the Message from the datastore
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technical went wrong

                                   throws I18nException

      • getAllMessagesGrouped

        Map<String,List<MessageResourceEntry>> getAllMessagesGrouped()
                                                      throws I18nException
        Method to resolve all messages available in the maintained data source.
        Returns:
        a map with all messages in the maintained data source grouped by type
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technical went wrong

      • putMessage

        @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRED)
void putMessage(String codeId,
                                                                                    Locale locale,
                                                                                    String message)
                                                                             throws I18nException
        inserts or updates a single message by code and locale from the backend. Internally calls the version with type with a default value
        Parameters:
        codeId - the code to resolve a message for
        locale - the language in which the message should be resolved-s
        message - the translation to put
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technical went wrong

      • putMessage

        @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRED)
void putMessage(String codeId,
                                                                                    Locale locale,
                                                                                    String message,
                                                                                    String type)
                                                                             throws I18nException
        inserts or updates a single message by code and locale from the backend.
        Parameters:
        codeId - the code to resolve a message for
        locale - the language in which the message should be resolved-s
        message - the translation to put
        type - the message type
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technical went wrong

      • deleteMessage

        @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRED)
void deleteMessage(String codeId)
                                                                                throws I18nException
        deletes a single message by code from the backend.
        Parameters:
        codeId - the code of the message to delete
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technical went wrong

      • deleteMessageForLanguage

        @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRED)
void deleteMessageForLanguage(String codeId,
                                                                                                  Locale locale)
                                                                                           throws I18nException
        deletes a single message by code and language from the backend.
        Parameters:
        codeId - the code of the message to delete
        locale - the locale of the language of the message to delete
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technical went wrong

      • exportToExcel97

        void exportToExcel97(OutputStream output)
              throws I18nException
        This method will write all messages in the datasource in MS Excel 97 format to the provided OutputStream. For more details about the format refer to the ExcelWriter
        Parameters:
        output - a Stream where the excel content should be written to DO NOT use a BufferedOutputStream here (Assertion will fail since the library has a problem with this), be sure to close the stream after this operation.
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technically went wrong
        See Also:
        ExcelWriter

      • exportToExcel2007

        void exportToExcel2007(OutputStream output)
                throws I18nException
        This method will write all messages in the datasource in MS Excel 2007 format to the provided OutputStream. For more details about the format refer to the ExcelWriter
        Parameters:
        output - a Stream where the excel content should be written to, be sure to close the stream after this operation.
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technically went wrong
        See Also:
        ExcelWriter

      • exportToText

        void exportToText(OutputStream output)
           throws I18nException
        Method writes a text representation for all messages in the system to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        output - Stream to write to
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technically went wrong

      • importFromExcel

        @Transactional(readOnly=false,
               propagation=REQUIRED)
void importFromExcel(InputStream input)
                                                                                  throws I18nException
        This method will read all messages form the MS Excel file content provided as InputStream. The workbook version (97/2007) will be detected automatically from the content. For more details about the format refer to the ExcelReader
        Parameters:
        input - an open and valid input stream, be sure to close the stream after this operation.
        Throws:
        I18nException - when something technically went wrong
        See Also:
        ExcelReader

      • getAvailableLanguages

        List<Locale> getAvailableLanguages()
                            throws I18nException
        Returns a list of currently available languages.
        Returns:
        the List with languagaes
        Throws:
        I18nException - problem with resolving of languages
